Everyone:

I'm trying to quote the "Grandma's Ham" story as told by Gerald =
Weinberg, but I can't find it in my copies of his books. This means that ei=
ther I have the wrong book in mind or I'm just blind. Can anyone help me wi=
th a correct reference?

If you don't know it, google "Grandma's Ham". The =
moral of the story is that we sometimes repeat what others did in the hopes=
 of having the same success, even though we don't know why.

cc: <jbr@diasp=
arsoftware.com>, if you don't mind. If you forget, that's cool too. :)

Tha=
nks.
